title: Village Building Order Frenzy - Novel Updates
author: Lazy Bird
description:
Zhang Yang receives a peculiar Village Building Order and triggers a series of bizarre missions. 

First, build a village in this fantasy world and ensure its survival for 300 years. 

Second, establish a base in this post-apocalyptic world and protect it from being overrun by a billion zombies. 

Third, found a kingdom in this game world and guarantee its existence after 300 years. 

Fourth, form a clan in the immortal world and make certain its heritage remains after 3000 years. 

Zhang Yang exclaims: “Save me! This Village Building Order is insane!”>
